name: Mysid Sim
description:
Mysid are a little known crustacean that perform a vital role in many bay area ecosystems. They're also literally little. Engage in the mysid's vital role in the bay-area food web and learn more about their behaviors and impact.

Migrate Swarm Eat
Feed

You conduct the swarm, aiming to avoid pollution, eat phytoplankton, and feed fish. All of these are vital activities to keep the local fish wildlife healthy and thriving.
